body:
I decided to try myself.

```ruby
require 'benchmark'
require 'active_support/all'

n = 500000
Benchmark.bm do |x|
  x.report("empty each") do
    n.times do 
      params = {}
      params.each do |attr, value|
        1
      end if params
    end
  end
  x.report("with present") do
    n.times do 
      params = {}
      params.each do |attr, value|
        1
      end if params.present?
    end
  end
end

```

Results:

```
       user     system      total        real
empty each  0.070000   0.000000   0.070000 (  0.068431)
with present  0.070000   0.000000   0.070000 (  0.074279)
```

So I guess it is a very, very, very tiny bit faster.
